name: Keepers
description:
Keepers is a space-themed clicker game.
You are an employee of a center tasked with saving a planet - a typical light-year.
The planet is supported by keepers, but they caught a disease, and the main tree without support began to wither.
To restore the balance, you need to cure the keepers, and you are tasked with preparing an extract from the fruits of nine plants. You have collected the seeds and are now patiently growing the garden.
The mechanics of the game are simple - collect the grown fruits and discover new plants. A space bug will interfere with you in the process, but it's realistic to cope (although it has the ability to slow down time).



Features:
- nice graphics;
- simple controls;
- interesting gameplay;
